question: Show cruise ships and resorts that offer a dance class.
sql_query1:
SELECT Cruise_Ship.name
FROM Cruise_Ship
WHERE Cruise_Ship.activities = "Dance Class"
UNION
SELECT All_Inclusive_Resort.name
FROM All_Inclusive_Resort
WHERE All_Inclusive_Resort.activities = "Dance Class"
sql_query2:
SELECT Cruise_Ship.name
FROM Cruise_Ship
UNION
SELECT All_Inclusive_Resort.name
FROM All_Inclusive_Resort
WHERE All_Inclusive_Resort.activities = "Dance Class"
interpretation1: Show any cruise ships and resorts where either offer a dance class.
interpretation2: Display all the cruise ships but only the resorts that offer a dance class.
